name: signup-mern
description: ------------front end setup--------------- 1st npx create-react-app client.in the client folder npm i axios redux react-redux @reduxjs/toolkit react-router-dom 2ns install tailwind css for styling. 3rd for building UI components use antd.npm install antd@4.24.5.@import after installing antd, @import '~antd/dist/antd.css' paste it in App.css ------------front end setup---------------
